snippet.title: Agatha Christie – Death on the Nile – Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3150480/Agatha_Christie__Death_on_the_Nile

Agatha Christie – Death on the Nile will be available in 2025 on PC, Nintendo Switch PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S.

Death on the Nile is an adventure-detective game, offering a fresh twist on Agatha Christie’s famous story. Set in the lively 1970s, play as Hercule Poirot and detective Jane Royce as they solve two connected mysteries. Dive into a journey filled with intrigue, deception, and unexpected revelations.

Follow Microids Studio Lyon on X (Twitter) to learn more: https://x.com/MicroidsLyon
